app.title: My App
app.description: This is a demo of a multilingual Next.js application using shadcn/ui components.
app.tryChangingLanguage: Try changing the language using the dropdown in the header.
app.content: This content is internationalized using react-intl. You can switch between English, Spanish, French, and German.
app.features.title: Features
dashboard.description: This is your main dashboard. Here you can view and manage your account information.
dashboard.stats.description: View your account statistics and activity.
dashboard.settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.
login.welcome: Welcome to our Complaints Management System! We're glad to have you here and look forward to helping you resolve any issues you may have.
onboarding.title: SINDH OMBUDSMAN
complaint.title: Title of Complaint
complaint.upload.hint: Supported file types: JPG, PNG, PDF (Max file size 2 MB)
complaint.affidavit.text: I solemnly affirm that the information provided is true to the best of my knowledge and belief, and that this complaint has not been filed elsewhere.
complaint.success.title: Complaint submitted successfully!
complaint.success.message: Your complaint has been submitted! We appreciate your feedback and will review it soon.
complaint.validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
complaint.validation.cnic: Please enter a valid 13-digit CNIC without dashes
complaint.validation.mobile: Please enter a valid mobile number
complaint.validation.title: Title must be between 10 and 100 characters
complaint.validation.description: Description must be at least 20 characters
complaint.validation.affidavit: You must affirm the affidavit to proceed
